name: YouFoot
tag_list: social-networks, football, soccer, sports, user-generated, media
description: Social apps for the football community
overview:
YouFoot launched in April 2010 offering social tools for the football community.

These apps are geared to:

  • fans who want to interact with their favorite club, players…
  • event organizers wishing to create or promote their football competition
  • football clubs that need social tools
  • media professionals seeking content or tools to generate football content

The platform is making popular collaborative applications such as:

  • football newsfeed and mini-feed
  • live match commentaries with automated statistic generation and multilingual support
  • pages for: matches, teams, players, competitions, and venues
  • a football kit editor
  • a football map to find team, recent transfers, upcoming matches
  • more than 25 stat widgets for team, players, competitions
